name: Sarah Johnson
summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development. Passionate about building scalable applications and solving complex problems. Strong background in Java, Python, and cloud technologies.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description:
• Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users
  • Reduced API response time by 40% through optimization and caching strategies
  • Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
  • Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description:
• Developed and maintained e-commerce platform using Spring Boot and React
  • Integrated third-party payment gateways and shipping APIs
  • Improved application performance by implementing Redis caching
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile environment

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description:
• Built RESTful APIs for mobile applications
  • Developed database schemas and optimized SQL queries
  • Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning
  • Fixed bugs and added new features based on user feedback

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

certifications: Oracle Certified Professional: Java SE 11 Developer
